summary: Craft Mirraks Mask and Armor, enchanted* or non-enchanted. Clothing, Light, and Heavy armor versions. Roughly Daedric Armor strength for heavy armor. Between Glass and Dragonscale for light. Requires that you beat the Dragonborn MQ in order to craft any of the gear.
descriptionHtml:
[Game]
Skyrim

[Mod Name]
Craft Miraaks Armour

[Author(s)]
Didymus Ei

[Contact Info]
Message me on the Nexus

[Version]
1.2

[size=4][b]Author activity on this mod:[color=red] Inactive[/color]
I\'m on a break as of March 15th, 2013. I\'ll check for bug reports over the first few weeks after the 15th.[/b][/size]

[Description]
Craft Mirraks Mask and Armor, enchanted* or non-enchanted. Clothing, Light, and Heavy armor 
versions. Roughly Daedric Armor strength for heavy armor. Between Glass and Dragonscale for 
light. Requires that you beat the Dragonborn DLC main quest.

- SPOILERS -
* - To craft enchanted versions you must use the mask or robe you looted off Miraak at the end
of Dragonborn.


[Change Log]
v1.2
- Fixed enchanged cloth boots

v1.1
- Added Gloves and boots
- Tweaked weights to better fit type (Light/Heavy)

V1.0 
- Initial release

[Required Files]
Official Dragonborn DLC

[Installation]
Unzip the file. Drag and drop the Data folder into your skyrim game directory. (steam/steamapps/common/skyrim/).

[Known Issues] 
- None I know of

[Tools Used]
Skyrim Readme Generator V6 by - DarkSaber9000

[Permissions]

Feel free to use whats here in your own work. Please just credit me if you do indeed use something directly from my file.
Do not, however, upload this file to any other website without my permission.
author: Didymus Ei
